      • getVerifiedEmailAddresses

        public java.util.List<VerifiedEmailAddress> getVerifiedEmailAddresses(java.lang.String accessToken,
                                                             java.lang.String status)
                                                               throws ConstantContactServiceException
        Get Verified Email Addresses call.
        Implements the Get Verified Email Addresses operation from the Accounts API by calling the ConstantContact server side.
        Specified by:
        getVerifiedEmailAddresses in interface IAccountService
        Parameters:
        accessToken - Constant Contact OAuth2 access token.
        status - The status, as seen in VerifiedEmailAddress.Status
        Returns:
        A list of VerifiedEmailAddress containing values returned from the server on success;
        An exception is thrown otherwise.
        Throws:
        ConstantContactServiceException - When something went wrong in the Constant Contact flow or an error is returned from server.

      • updateAccountInfo

        public AccountInfo updateAccountInfo(java.lang.String accessToken,
                            AccountInfo accountInfo)
                              throws ConstantContactServiceException
        Updates the Account Info.
        Implements the update Account Info operation of the Account Summary Info API by calling the ConstantContact server side.
        Specified by:
        updateAccountInfo in interface IAccountService
        Parameters:
        accessToken - Constant Contact OAuth2 access token.
        accountInfo - The account information.
        Returns:
        An AccountInfo containing data as returned by the server on success;
        An exception is thrown otherwise.

        ConstantContactServiceException - When something went wrong in the Constant Contact flow or an error is returned from server.
